Player History

Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1966, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1967, winning 2 games with a 1.00 ERA...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/7/1968 to a 2-year deal worth $7,185,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1968 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1968, winning 2 games with a 1.00 ERA...
Injured on 5/11/1969 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/1/1970 to a 2-year deal worth $5,960,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1970, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Injured on 9/19/1970 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/25/1971 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/7/1972 to a 1-year deal worth $528,000 per year...
Released by Atlanta on 2/13/1972...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/26/1972 to a 1-year deal worth $436,300 per year...
